column4: is there any way to prevent that message: [ 3004.663637] hub 1-0:1.0: over-current change on port 2 to show and annoy me in ctrl+alt+f1 mode?
it does that everywhere I got in ctrl+alt+f1-6
I think it looks like a problem with a usb hub
yeah I know and I can't really correct it
I only want to block it from showing
